ideas.title: Add keyboard navigation to DspMatchList filter tabs
ideas.description: The DspMatchList component has filter buttons (All, Pending, Confirmed, etc.) that only respond to click events. These should support keyboard navigation as a tab-like interface with arrow keys.
ideas.current_state: Filter buttons are individual buttons without ARIA role='tablist' or keyboard arrow navigation. Users must tab through each button individually.
ideas.proposed_change: Convert to proper tabs pattern: 1) Add role='tablist' to container, 2) Add role='tab' and aria-selected to each button, 3) Implement arrow key navigation like RangeToggle.tsx, 4) Use roving tabindex pattern (tabIndex={isActive ? 0 : -1}).

ideas.title: Add missing aria-label to ArtistSearch form input
ideas.description: The ArtistSearch component has an input field without an associated label element or aria-label. Screen reader users cannot understand what this input is for.
ideas.current_state: Input has placeholder text but no label element, aria-label, or aria-labelledby. The submit button also lacks descriptive aria-label when showing the loading spinner.
ideas.proposed_change: 1) Add <label className='sr-only' htmlFor='artist-search'>Search for your artist name</label>, 2) Add id='artist-search' to input, 3) Add aria-label='Search' to button, 4) Add aria-busy={isSearching} to button during loading.

ideas.title: Add loading skeleton to SocialsForm during initial data fetch
ideas.description: The SocialsForm shows a simple pulse animation during loading but lacks meaningful skeleton structure. Users cannot anticipate the form layout while data loads.
ideas.current_state: Shows 3 generic animated rectangles during loading. These don't match the actual form structure (platform selector + URL input + remove button).
ideas.proposed_change: Replace generic skeletons with structured skeleton matching actual form row layout: 1) Add Skeleton component for 32px wide platform selector, 2) Add flex-1 Skeleton for URL input, 3) Add 24px wide Skeleton for remove button. Follow pattern from DashboardActivityFeed's ActivityLoadingSkeleton.

ideas.title: Replace hardcoded colors in Combobox with design tokens
ideas.description: The Combobox component uses hardcoded color values (bg-white/5, text-white, ring-white/10, text-red-400) instead of semantic design tokens, causing inconsistency with dark mode and theme switching.
ideas.current_state: Uses hardcoded colors: 'bg-white/5', 'text-white', 'ring-white/10', 'placeholder-white/70', 'text-red-400', 'bg-gray-900'. These assume a dark background context.
ideas.proposed_change: Replace with semantic tokens: 1) bg-white/5 -> bg-surface-1, 2) text-white -> text-primary-token, 3) ring-white/10 -> ring-subtle, 4) placeholder-white/70 -> placeholder:text-secondary-token, 5) text-red-400 -> text-error-token. Reference ClaimBanner.tsx for proper token usage.

ideas.title: Add proper error states to TipSelector component
ideas.description: The TipSelector component lacks visual error handling when the onContinue callback fails. Users have no feedback if payment processing fails.
ideas.current_state: Component only shows 'Processing...' during loading but has no error prop or error display. If onContinue throws, there's no visual feedback to the user.
ideas.proposed_change: 1) Add error?: string prop to interface, 2) Add error display below button similar to SocialsForm pattern, 3) Add aria-invalid and aria-describedby to button when error exists, 4) Add role='alert' to error message for screen reader announcement.

ideas.title: Improve mobile touch targets in ArtistCarousel
ideas.description: The ArtistCarousel has artist images at 96px (24x24) on mobile which is adequate, but the hover overlay only shows artist name on hover/focus, making it inaccessible on touch devices.
ideas.current_state: Artist names only appear on hover overlay with opacity transition. Mobile users cannot see artist names without long-press, and there's no visible indicator that these are tappable links.
ideas.proposed_change: 1) Show artist name below image on mobile (sm:hidden), 2) Add visible focus ring for keyboard navigation, 3) Consider adding a subtle 'View Profile' indicator on hover/focus, 4) Add aria-label to Link with full text: 'View {artist.name}'s profile'.

ideas.title: Add focus trap and keyboard dismiss to ReleaseProviderMatrix sidebar
ideas.description: The ReleaseSidebar opens as a panel but may not properly trap focus or support Escape key to close, making it difficult for keyboard users to navigate.
ideas.current_state: ReleaseSidebar is rendered as a sibling div without focus management. When opened, focus doesn't automatically move to the sidebar, and Escape key behavior is not visible in the component.
ideas.proposed_change: 1) Use @headlessui/react Dialog or implement focus trap, 2) Auto-focus first interactive element when sidebar opens, 3) Add onKeyDown handler for Escape to call onClose, 4) Return focus to trigger element when closed. Reference RightDrawer.tsx pattern.

ideas.title: Add empty state loading indicator to UnifiedTable
ideas.description: The UnifiedTable component shows a LoadingTableBody during loading, but the loading state uses generic skeleton rows that don't match actual column structure.
ideas.current_state: LoadingTableBody renders generic skeleton rows. These don't reflect actual column widths or structure, leading to layout shift when data loads.
ideas.proposed_change: 1) Pass column definitions to LoadingTableBody, 2) Generate skeleton cells matching column widths, 3) Add aria-busy='true' to table during loading, 4) Consider adding subtle progress indication in table header.

ideas.title: Replace hardcoded colors in DspMatchList error state
ideas.description: The DspMatchList error state uses hardcoded red color values (border-red-500/30, bg-red-500/10, text-red-600) instead of semantic error tokens.
ideas.current_state: Error state uses: 'border-red-500/30', 'bg-red-500/10', 'text-red-600 dark:text-red-400'. This is inconsistent with other error displays in the codebase.
ideas.proposed_change: 1) Use border-error-token/30 or border-destructive, 2) Use bg-error-token/10, 3) Use text-error-token. Reference ErrorBanner.tsx for consistent error styling patterns.

ideas.title: Add responsive breakpoints to ReleaseProviderMatrix footer stats
ideas.description: The ReleaseProviderMatrix footer shows statistics text that may wrap awkwardly on small screens due to the justify-between layout.
ideas.current_state: Footer shows '15 releases (3 manual overrides)' on left and 'Showing 4 of 8 providers' on right with flex justify-between. On narrow screens, this can wrap poorly.
ideas.proposed_change: 1) Stack vertically on mobile: flex-col sm:flex-row, 2) Center text on mobile: text-center sm:text-left, 3) Hide less important 'Showing X of Y providers' on mobile: hidden sm:block, 4) Consider using a Tooltip for detailed info on mobile.

key_findings: Good ARIA label coverage (156 components) but some key interactive components missing labels
Loading states are well-implemented but skeletons don't always match final layout structure
196 occurrences of hardcoded colors (bg-white, text-gray, etc.) instead of design tokens
Keyboard navigation patterns are inconsistent - some components excellent (RangeToggle, LinkActions), others lacking
Error handling in forms is generally good, but some interactive components lack error feedback
